2Running
paragraph.paragraph: After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above. On the left side of the main window a date is displayed in a COMBO_BOX. Clicking on this COMBO_BOX and a CALENDAR control will appear showing the same date than in the COMBO_BOX. On the the right side of the main window are the commands to control the format of the displayed date and the style of the CALENDAR control.

Clicking on the "Change font" button and a
/images/dotnet_samples/change_font_dialog.png change font dialog box will appear.

Clicking on the "Change color" button and a
/images/dotnet_samples/date_time_picker_change_color_dlg.png dialog box will appear that will permit you to customize the color appearance of the calendar thought a
/images/dotnet_samples/change_color_dialog.png color dialog box .
paragraph.heading: 2Under the Hood
paragraph.paragraph: This application uses several different controls, but tend to show how to parameter the CALENDAR control using the FONT_DIALOG and COLOR_DIALOG.
When one of the buttons "Change font" or "Change color" is pressed, an event is launched and open the corresponding dialog box.
When the entry in the COMBO_BOXformat change, an event is launched and modify the format of the displayed date.
